title: Add validate for duplicated single table.
body:
Prevent adding same single table in one logic datasource.
Like this.
```
mysql> SHOW DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE STORAGE UNIT;
+-------------------+
| storage_unit_name |
+-------------------+
| RANDOM            |
+-------------------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

mysql> create table t2 (id int);
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.14 sec)

mysql> create table t2 (id int);
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.15 sec)
```

title: Change  SINGLE TABLE RULE & RESOURCE to STORAGE UNIT DistSQL syntax #21671 #21672
body:
For #21672 #21671.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- CREATE DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE RULE RESOURCE = xx -> SET DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE STORAGE UNIT = xx
- ALTER DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE RULE RESOURCE -> REMOVE IT
- DROP DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE RULE -> SET DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE STORAGE UNIT = RANDOM (RANDOM is keyword)
- SHOW SINGLE TABLE RULES -> SHOW DEFAULT SINGLE TABLE STORAGE UNIT

- ADD RESOURCE -> REGISTER STORAGE UNIT
- ALTER RESOURCE -> ALTER STORAGE UNIT 
- DROP RESOURCE -> UNREGISTER STORAGE UNIT
- SHOW DATABASE RESOURCES -> SHOW STORAGE UNITS
- SHOW UNUSED RESOURCES -> SHOW STORAGE UNITS WHERE usage_count = 0

title: [ISSUE #21573] Update datatype specifier in the input parameter to ma
body:
Fixes #21573.

Changes proposed in this pull request.
  - The google.guava library (**Refer**: https://github.com/google/guava/blob/989e3b261eb3c67b42c97f612b5d726f03e1e300/guava/src/com/google/common/base/Strings.java#L285) which formats the string has implementation only to replace %s in the supplied string template.
  - This would lead to wrong data being returned.
  -  The below code will not return the desired data 
      `Preconditions.checkArgument(false, "Port %d of %s must be a positive number", 8080, "Data");`

        Ideally the code should return
        **Port 8080 of Data must be a positive number**
         Whereas the code will return
        **Port %d of 8080 must be a positive number [Data]**

---

title: Add Release Profile for `distribution/proxy-native`
body:
For #21347.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Add Release Profile for `distribution/proxy-native`.
  - Update GraalVM Native Build Tools to `0.9.16`.
  - Add the corresponding LICENSE.
  - Fixes the wrong Docker Base Image in the Dockerfile, because the current GraalVM Native Build Tools is still using dynamic linking instead of static linking, which requires more system library support.
  - Switched CI from https://github.com/graalvm/graalvm-ce-builds  to https://github.com/graalvm/graalvm-ce-dev-builds  for faster resolution of earlier issues. This is mainly because a series of fixes related to the file system for GraalVM Native Image is currently only in the dev build of GraalVM, and we need to verify it earlier. Issues like https://github.com/oracle/graal/issues/5020 and https://github.com/oracle/graal/issues/5080 actually solve a bunch of problems around being a directory instead of a file .

---

title: Fix null exception for #19814
body:

### Before
```sql
postgres=> select * from t_order;
ERROR:  Cannot invoke "org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.metadata.database.schema.decorator.model.ShardingSphereSchema.getVisibleColumnNames(String)" because the return value of "java.util.Map.get(Object)" is null
```

### After
```sql
postgres=> select * from t_order;
ERROR:  Schema `public` does not exist.
```

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Check schema exists before use it
  - Add test case
